title: Senior Backend Engineer
description: We're looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to build our core AI platform. You'll work on scalable APIs, ML inference pipelines, and data infrastructure. Our stack includes Python, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Redis, and AWS.
requirements: 5+ years Python experience, FastAPI or Django, PostgreSQL, AWS, experience with ML systems, Docker/Kubernetes

title: ML Platform Engineer
description: Join our ML Platform team to build and maintain production ML infrastructure. You'll work on feature stores, model serving, and experiment tracking.
requirements: 4+ years experience, Python, PyTorch or TensorFlow, MLflow, Kubernetes, strong systems design skills

title: Frontend React Developer
description: Looking for a React developer to build beautiful, responsive web applications. You'll work closely with designers to create pixel-perfect UIs.
requirements: 3+ years React, TypeScript, CSS/Tailwind, Figma, strong design sensibility

title: DevOps Engineer
description: We need a DevOps engineer to manage our cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines. You'll work with Terraform, Kubernetes, and AWS to keep our systems running smoothly.
requirements: 3+ years DevOps, AWS/GCP, Terraform, Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD pipelines, monitoring (Datadog/Prometheus)

title: Data Scientist
description: Join our data science team to build predictive models and derive insights from large datasets. You'll work on customer segmentation, churn prediction, and recommendation systems.
requirements: MS in Statistics/CS/Math, Python, pandas, scikit-learn, SQL, experience with A/B testing and statistical modeling

title: Python Backend Developer
description: Build secure, high-performance backend services for our financial platform. You'll work on payment processing, account management, and real-time transaction systems using Python and FastAPI.
requirements: 4+ years Python, FastAPI or Flask, PostgreSQL, Redis, experience with financial systems or payment APIs, strong security practices

title: Mobile Developer (iOS)
description: We're looking for an iOS developer to build beautiful mobile applications using Swift and SwiftUI. You'll work on consumer-facing apps with millions of users.
requirements: 3+ years iOS development, Swift, SwiftUI, UIKit, Core Data, REST APIs, App Store submission experience

title: Full Stack Engineer (Python + React)
description: Build features end-to-end across our SaaS platform. Our stack is Python/FastAPI on the backend and React/TypeScript on the frontend. You'll own features from database schema to UI component.
requirements: 3+ years full-stack, Python, FastAPI or Django, React, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Docker, CI/CD experience

title: Marketing Coordinator
description: Coordinate marketing campaigns across digital and traditional channels. Manage social media accounts, email campaigns, and event logistics.
requirements: 2+ years marketing experience, social media management, email marketing tools (Mailchimp, HubSpot), strong writing skills, project management

title: AI/ML Engineer
description: Build production AI systems including LLM-powered applications, RAG pipelines, and ML inference services. Work with cutting-edge models and frameworks to solve real-world problems.
requirements: 4+ years experience, Python, LangChain, vector databases (ChromaDB/Pinecone), PyTorch, FastAPI, AWS/GCP, experience deploying ML models to production
